net.sf.JRecord.Common

Interface AbstractRecord

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AbstractRecordX<FieldDefinition>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RecordDetail

    public interface AbstractRecord
    Very Basic RecordLayout interface. It is used by the field Definitions to get Data from the RecordDefinition that it belongs to
    Author:
    Bruce Martin
